original_text: Their rims were high and awesome, and all four rims were full of eyes all around.
korean_text: 그 둘레는 높고 무서우며 그 네 둘레로 돌아가면서 눈이 가득하며

sentences.original_text: Their rims were high and awesome
and all four rims were full of eyes all around
sentences.korean_translation: 네 테두리 모두가 사방으로 눈으로 가득 찼더라
